identity.name: PoncikFocus
identity.description: A productivity app that feels like a warm hug. It gamifies studying without the stress, using a cute mascot 'Poncik' and a cafe-themed reward system.

headings.usage: Use for all section titles, greetings, and major stats. It must feel rounded and friendly.

body.usage: Use for all general text, tasks, and descriptions. High readability but maintaining the soft curve.

monospace.usage: Only for timer digits if needed for alignment.

texture.usage: Overlay on the main background with opacity-20 and mix-blend-mode: multiply to give a tactile paper feel.

layout_strategy.container: max-w-md mx-auto md:max-w-4xl lg:max-w-6xl px-4 md:px-8
layout_strategy.spacing: Relaxed. Use gap-6 or gap-8. Don't crowd the elements.

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 rounded-full px-8 py-3 font-bold shadow-soft transition-transform active:scale-95
buttons.secondary: bg-secondary/20 text-secondary-foreground hover:bg-secondary/30 rounded-full px-6 py-2 font-semibold

cards.style: bg-surface border border-border/50 rounded-3xl shadow-card overflow-hidden relative

inputs.style: bg-surface_highlight border-2 border-border/50 focus:border-primary rounded-xl px-4 py-3 outline-none transition-colors text-text_main placeholder:text-text_muted

mascot.usage: Display Poncik on the Dashboard greeting, Success Modals, and Empty States. He is the user's study buddy.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. THEME TOGGLE: Implement a theme toggle but DEFAULT to the 'Light/Cozy' theme. The dark theme should be warm, not pitch black.
2. MASCOT: 'Poncik' must greet the user. Create a component <PoncikAvatar /> that handles his different states (idle, happy, studying).
3. GAMIFICATION: The 'Shop' is for spending 'Focus Credits'. These are VIRTUAL items (coffee, donut) that decorate the user's virtual desk or profile.
4. MUSIC: Implement a simple audio player with a 'Lofi' playlist. It should persist across pages if possible (or be available on the Dashboard).
5. COMPONENTS: Use Shadcn UI for complex logic (Dialog, Form, Toast) but STRIP the default styling. Apply the 'visual_enhancers' rules (Rounded-3xl, Warm Colors).
6. FONTS: You must load 'Fredoka' and 'Nunito' from Google Fonts in the index.html or CSS.
7. LAYOUT: The Dashboard should be a Bento Grid. Left col: Timer (Hero). Right col: To-do list (Tall) + Music Player (Small).
8. LANGUAGE: Provide a toggle for EN/TR (English/Turkish). Hardcode the strings for now or use a simple dictionary object.
9. ANIMATION: Use framer-motion for page transitions and button clicks. The app should feel 'alive' and 'bouncy'.
UNIVERSAL_GUIDELINES_FOR_MAIN_AGENT: You tend to converge toward generic, 'on distribution' outputs. In frontend design, this creates what users call the 'AI slop' aesthetic. Avoid this: make creative, distinctive frontends that surprise and delight.
Dark colors look good when used independently without gradients. DO NOT use dark colors as gradients
Don't make generic centered layouts, simplistic gradients, and uniform styling.
Create depth through layered design elements with z-index hierarchy
Use glass-morphism effects with backdrop filters (12-24px blur)
You MUST NOT apply universal transition. Eg: transition: all. This results in breaking transforms. Always add transitions for specific interactive elements like button, input excluding transforms
You MUST NOT center align the app container, ie do not add .App { text-align: center; } in the css file. This disrupts the human natural reading flow of text
Always use modern button styles like pill-shaped, or sharp button with interaction animations & color relevant to the app style
